message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $18,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your response, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $19,000 and still make this worthwhile for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at that price?

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I'm still not able to meet at $19,000. I'd like to propose $18,500 as my maximum offer. I hope this might help us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
